DataElement.preferredName: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status Questionnaire Less Than or Equal To One Score Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates whether the ECOG performance status score of the patient is less than or equal to one which meets the criteria for participation on a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status Questionnaire Less Than or Equal To One Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status (Oken MM, Creech RH, Tormey DC, Horton J, Davis TE, McFadden ET, Carbone PP. Toxicity and response criteria of the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group. Am J Clin Oncol. 1982 Dec;5(6):649-55)._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways._The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status (Oken MM, Creech RH, Tormey DC, Horton J, Davis TE, McFadden ET, Carbone PP. Toxicity and response criteria of the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group. Am J Clin Oncol. 1982 Dec;5(6):649-55).

Concepts.longName: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status Clinical Classification
Concepts.definition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status (Oken MM, Creech RH, Tormey DC, Horton J, Davis TE, McFadden ET, Carbone PP. Toxicity and response criteria of the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group. Am J Clin Oncol. 1982 Dec;5(6):649-55). CDISC believes this instrument to be in the public domain, but you should perform your own assessment.

Property.preferredName: Less Than or Equal To One Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways.:The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
